dublinCore.dc:title: 119 S1452 IS: To extend certain authorities under the Defense Production Act of 1950.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Scott of South Carolina (for himself and Ms. Warren) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

form.official-title: To extend certain authorities under the Defense Production Act of 1950.

section.header: Extension of Defense Production Act of 1950
section.text: Section 717(a) of the Defense Production Act of 1950 (50 U.S.C. 4564(a)) is amended by striking September 30, 2025 and inserting September 30, 2026.
